TopicTitle: I am a non recovering user of MechJeb

Articles.Content:
Ok... so I love this plugin and can't wait to see what else people come up with.

And it is not cheating... like I need to tilt at 10k and fly at course 090Ã‚Â° manually during each flight manually... That's like saying using a calculator is cheating at math.

Well... got that off my chest. Whew... feel a lot better.

Thanks for listening.
I think this belongs in general discussion. At least not in the addon development subforum.
Yeah we should move it. But relax FlyMario, real astronauts use mechjeb too.
The first manned NASA rockets were completely automatic... COMPLETELY.
